ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 202
ygData.msgSnippet: This is something I thought about also, so I looked at the spells lists over at http://eq.castersrealm.com under the spell lists for conjuration spells
ygData.messageBody:
This is something I thought about also, so I looked at the spells lists over
at http://eq.castersrealm.com under the spell lists for conjuration spells
thinking maybe this would be better. Conjuration skill is only the mezmerize
line of spells and my thoughts were that this would be too limiting. Besides
the damage and buff spells, the charm line is also alteration, and I find
myself using this in conjuction with the enthrall line all the time to swing
the odds.

Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT

> Message: 6
> Date: Wed, 15 Dec 1999 13:21:46 -0600
> > Message: 7
> Date: Wed, 15 Dec 1999 16:25:05 -0500
> From: Tekdruid <Tekdruid@...>
> Subject: RE: Specialization
>
> Good Point. What you choose for specialization is dependant on your play
> style. It is RECOMMENDED that enchanters specialize in alteration, but if
you
> think another would be more useful, then specialize in that. A
> specialize:Conjuration would be useful as well for an enchanter who is
strict
> crowd control and doesn't buff/debuff as much. Specialize:Alteration is
simply
> recommended mostly because most of the enchanters spells ARE Alteration.
>
> Tinik
> 19 Gnomish Enchanter
> Veeshan
>
>
